name: .PDM File Extension
summary: Learn about .PDM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Database created with Sybase PowerDesigner, an enterprise modeling and design program; stores database information as well as references to other files, such as the database definition (.XDB) file and model definition (.XEM) files.

content: PDM files can also be opened with Quest Software's QDesigner, which was discontinued in 2006.
NOTE: PowerDesigner was originally developed by Sybase, which was purchased by SAP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Word with ProntoDoc for Word plug-in
